channel.title: Urgent please help
channel.description:
mr appletart is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 Could not save for mr appletart ClientHandler: Client mr appletart saved. ClientHandler: Client mr appletart disconnected.
Please, i've tried chmodding 777 * and nothing happens. Can someone help? Using a debian VPS. thanks.

item.title: Urgent please help
item.dc:creator: @appletart appletart
item.description:
@appletart wrote:

I don’t want to install virtualbox and take all that time of installing xp, could you please help?

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent please help
item.dc:creator: @Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP Goodbye RS, Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Goodbye_RS_Hello_RSP wrote:

Install VirtualBox onto your Linux based VPS. Create a Microsoft Windows XP virtual machine, and use seamless mode.

Read full topic
